title: Lesson 08 - One Minute Catalan
description: In lesson 8 of One Minute Catalan you will learn to count from one to ten. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Catalan at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com. One Minute Catalan is brought to you by the Radio Lingua Network and is ©Copyright 2008.
